name: Nulla
description:
Greetings!

Nulla is an endless runner game where we try to isolate ourselves from the heat and cold

Does It Have a Story?

Our character, who has two kinds of suits, takes both suits and goes on a journey. In order to pass the obstacles in its journey, it must either use its parkour skills or protect itself by wearing its suits
But this journey will be long and difficult

This game was made in two days for Frost Jam 4, hosted by İTÜ OTG

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to play endless runner - action games
• People in the İTU OTG community
• Our friends who are curious about the game we made
• Those who want to get angry and break their keyboard

Controls

Frost Suit Up: Q

Normal Suit Up: W

Magma Suit Up: E

Restart Game: R

Jump: Space

Back to Main Menu: Esc

System Requirements

You can even play on a Toaster

Credits

Authors
Alperen Güner - Game Designer
Talha Genç - Programmer
Helen İnsel - Pixel Artist

Special Thanks
Yusuf Kızılkaya - Musician
